Author: throwawaytruerat57
Text: sorry if im giving unsolicited advice but i struggled with the same thing until i started eating more fat. i know that ‘full but not full’ feeling that comes with eating really low calorie food in mass amounts. i was terrified to add calorie dense foods but 80 cals of avocado or 50 cals of oil can make the same meal extremely satiating and satisfying if thats something you feel like trying
